page.title: 02THE DEN OF FOWLIS EASTER
page.content: This area is dominated by farming.A typical type of crop is the berry. Raspberry and strawberry fields provide casual work for travellers and unemployed. The area is devoid of permanent residents and farmworkers travel from outside the area each day.Mains of Fowlis Farm is the main feature of this area providing employment for approx. ten people. Land cover is mainly Oats,Barley and Oil seed rape as well as berries. The landscape presents a picturesque view with the Den of Fowlis Burn flowing through the whole of the area.Locally the area is known as "Spinky Den".
